NCS POWERED BY THE CHALLENGE
Urgent: Senior Associate Mentor Application Deadline Extended
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
We hope you're enjoying the Easter break, and have managed to find time between revising for exams to look at the Senior Associate Mentor Opportunities that we sent out earlier in the month.
This email is to notify you of a change to the deadline dates for applications for the three roles, please see below:
Summer Senior
Application deadline - Monday 28th April at 10am. Please email your cover letter to vicky.harrold@the-challenge.org
Successful candidates will be invited to assessment on Saturday 17th May. To fulfill this role you will be required to attend a full days training during the week commencing Monday 25th May.
Graduate Dragon
Application deadline - Monday 28th April at 10am. Please email your cover letter to charlotte.dowling@the-challenge.org
Successful candidates will partake in a phone interview during the week commencing Monday 5th May. To fulfill this role you will be required to attend a half day training session during the week commencing Monday 25th May.
Campaign Coach:
Application deadline - Friday 2nd May. Please email your cover letter to sophie.field@the-challenge.org
To fulfill this role you will be required to attend a half day training session during the week commencing Monday 25th May.
All Job Descriptions for the roles are attached to the email we sent you a couple of weeks ago. Any questions please contact one of the email addresses above.
We look forward to receiving your applications.
The Challenge Society Team
